title: Sausage Curry
directions: Fry onion, celery and coriander until just coloured, and softened
Chop capsicum and peas and set aside
Add spices to pan and stir
Chop sausages into pieces and add to pan
Make up coconut cream according to packet instructions and add to pan
Add vegies and cook for 3 minutes to keep vegies crunchy.
ingredients: 1 teaspoon of each – garam marsala, ground ginger, ground coriander seed, turmeric, cumin
